hero.title: Available Courses
hero.subtitle: Mathematics courses organized with learning objectives, modules, and resources.

articles.title: Algebra
articles.content: Foundations of algebraic thinking. Master equations, functions, and polynomials.

articles.title: Geometry
articles.content: Explore shapes, spaces, and spatial relationships. Understand geometric proofs and properties.

articles.title: Calculus
articles.content: Learn limits, derivatives, and integrals. Understand the mathematics of change and accumulation.

articles.title: Statistics
articles.content: Probability, distributions, and inference. Learn to analyze data and make evidence-based conclusions.

articles.title: Linear Algebra
articles.content: Matrices, vectors, and linear transformations. Essential for advanced mathematics and applications.

articles.title: Discrete Mathematics
articles.content: Logic, sets, combinatorics, and graph theory. Foundations for computer science and discrete structures.

content.text: Each course is organized into modules, covering specific topics with clear learning objectives. Modules include:

items: References—books and materials for deeper learning
Exercises—problems to practice and solidify understanding

content.text: Start with Algebra if you're building a foundation. Progress through the sequence for comprehensive understanding. Use the Mathematics learning path for guided progression.
